## getAppEvents() function

### getAppEvents() function

Used to retrieve an event bus that manages application level events

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export declare function getAppEvents(): EventBus;
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { getAppEvents } from '@grafana/runtime';
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`EventBus`
